Release LTS.470.7 of November 5, 2025
New Features
Now for each registry, it is possible to
override
the available methods for opening objects.
When building a
universal graph
, it became possible to:
Sort data by series or category names, as well as categories by series values.
Set a style for the chart title and subtitle.
Now with the help of the
sendMsgToEmail
,
sendMsgToSubject
, and
sendMsgToSubjects
functions, it is possible to pass email addresses to which the recipient can send a reply message.
It is now possible to configure
security policy
by privilege level.
For attributes of “Date”, “Date and time”, “Time”, “Numeric”, “Integer”, “Money”, “String”, and “Boolean” types, it is now possible to
encrypt values
in the database.
Audit
was implemented to record system actions, and error audit was improved.
The calculation of the limit of simultaneously active users under the current license was improved.
Changes and Improvements
The configuration of
object-type expressions
was debugged.
The validation during index creation was optimized.
A condition was added to enforce the required attribute in the “Attribute for permission inheritance” filter.
The display of the multiselect attribute after performing an
action
with the algorithm calculation based on the selected object was stabilized.
The display of duplicate objects with validation errors was debugged.
The Del key operation was debugged when working with the domain.
The names of domain settings were corrected.
The columns of the
"User"
registry type were corrected.
In registry edit mode, the “Save on focus loss” option was debugged for logical attribute value changes.
The search process for visible elements only was debugged.
The process of adding child type attributes of a related object type in the
registry configuration
was debugged.
The display of values in the
tile registry
was debugged.
Focus setting for the
"Text with advanced formatting support"
and
"Multiline input"
visuals was improved.
Focus behavior when selecting an element in the object profile navigation window was debugged.
In Safari browser, the display of
template covers
during
instance visual setup
was stabilized.
The insertion of the full hyperlink address into the attribute with the
"Text with advanced formatting support"
visual was debugged.
Saving of the visual after moving the
"Dashboard"
widget to a new
row
was stabilized.
The ability to lock the
"Financial reporting"
widget was debugged.
In the
"Object registry"
widget, saving of selected filter settings when switching registries was debugged.
The
"Calendar booking"
widget was improved.
The display of code in the algorithm editor placed on a visual via a
frame
was debugged.
The object attribute filtering was debugged in the
"Explorer" widget
.
On the
Kanban board
(extended version), the card order after page refresh was stabilized.
The configuration of the
Kanban board
added to an object visual through the
"Dashboard"
widget was stabilized.
The operation of
SQL data source
created when configuring the
multidimensional cube (OLAP)
was stabilized.
The display of multiple object selection in the
"Table" analytical dashboard
was debugged.
The xref:object-data-source.adoc[Object was adapted to work with the object type that uses the "Inheritance of permissions with system control" access control type.
Filtering in the "Access control by condition tree" access control type was stabilized.
The operation of the
deduplicate
function was debugged.
The visibility of the
start page configuration button
was debugged according to user permissions.
The functionality for binding IP addresses to
user accounts
was improved.
The
profile setup
for self-registration was improved.
Permission checks when working with an object were debugged.
The restriction on creating instances of “Localized constants” [SYS_LOCALIZED_CONSTANT] type was removed for the “All users” access group.
The
update creation
process containing references to internal application objects was improved.
The transfer of updates containing the
extended Kanban board
was debugged.
The display of the number of
user sessions
was improved.
A vulnerability when creating an algorithm was fixed.
The operation of
security policy
was debugged.
The System behavior during initialization was improved.
The configuration of the
LDAP domain authorization
settings was streamlined.
The update to the new platform version was stabilized.
The generation of a reporting form through
data transformation
was debugged.
In review mode, the ability to delete non-printable characters and accept edits was improved.
Document text locking settings were debugged.
The navigation to the specified document page was stabilized.
The ability to remove and add lists was debugged.
The possibility to simultaneously delete a footnote and a section was debugged.
The creation of new document versions was stabilized.
The ability to generate an invitation link to a private chat was removed.
